item.title: MOSN
item.description: MOSN # mosn/mosn MOSN is a cloud native proxy for edge or service mesh. https://mosn.io

item.title: Dapr
item.description: Dapr # Distributed Application Runtime dapr/dapr Dapr is a portable, serverless, event-driven runtime that makes it easy for developers to build resilient, stateless and stateful microservices that run on the cloud and edge and embraces the diversity of languages and developer frameworks.

item.title: Consul
item.description: Consul # hashicorp/consul Consul is a distributed, highly available, and data center aware solution to connect and configure applications across dynamic, distributed infrastructure. https://www.consul.io/

item.title: Traefik Mesh
item.description: Traefik Mesh # traefik/mesh Consul is a distributed, highly available, and data center aware solution to connect and configure applications across dynamic, distributed infrastructure. https://www.consul.io/
